kyc.title: Identity Verification
kyc.subtitle: Complete verification to start selling on SkinTrader
kyc.documentDesc: Upload a clear photo of your passport or ID card
kyc.selfieDesc: Take a selfie holding your ID document
kyc.notSubmittedDesc: Complete identity verification to start selling
kyc.pendingDesc: Your documents are being reviewed. This usually takes 1-2 business days.
kyc.approvedDesc: Your identity has been verified. You can now create listings.
kyc.rejectedDesc: Your verification was rejected. Please try again with valid documents.
kyc.verifiedMessage: Your identity has been verified. You can now create listings and trade on the marketplace.
kyc.reviewingDocs: We're reviewing your documents. This usually takes 24-48 hours. We'll notify you once it's complete.
kyc.uploadDocumentDesc: Upload a clear photo of your passport, driver's license, or national ID card.
kyc.takeSelfieDesc: Take a clear selfie to verify your identity matches the document.
kyc.req1: Document must be valid and not expired
kyc.req2: All text must be clearly readable
kyc.req3: No glare or shadows on photo
kyc.selfieTip2: Good lighting, no shadows on face
kyc.securityNote: Your documents are encrypted and securely stored. We only use them to verify your identity and will never share them with third parties.
